ktt.lib.httpserver.RequestHandler

    Package Description
    ktt.lib.httpserver  
    ktt.lib.httpserver.handler  

    • Uses of RequestHandler in ktt.lib.httpserver

      Methods in ktt.lib.httpserver that return types with arguments of type RequestHandler 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      abstract java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​RequestHandler> HttpServer.getContexts()
      Returns a copy of a map of the server's contexts and their handlers.
      Methods in ktt.lib.httpserver with parameters of type RequestHandler 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      abstract void HttpServer.createContext​(java.lang.String path, RequestHandler handler)
      Creates a context mapped to a specified RequestHandler.

    • Uses of RequestHandler in ktt.lib.httpserver.handler

      Subclasses of RequestHandler in ktt.lib.httpserver.handler 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  FilePostHandler
      A Request Handler that returns a file.
      class  FilePreHandler
      A Request Handler that returns a file and preloaded bytes.
      class  PredicateHandler
      The Request Handler will process each request differently depending on the predicate.
      class  RedirectHandler
      A Request Handler that redirects to a different URL without saving to the history.
      class  RootHandler
      By default the Http Server will use the most specific context for requests; This means however, creating a Request Handler using context / will process all requests without a handler instead of sending a 404 response.
      Constructors in ktt.lib.httpserver.handler with parameters of type RequestHandler 
      Constructor Description
      PredicateHandler​(RequestHandler T, RequestHandler F, java.util.function.Predicate<ExchangePacket> predicate)
      Creates a varied Request Handler.
      RootHandler​(RequestHandler index, RequestHandler alt)
      Creates a root handler.
